public class font_dialog
extends Dialog
Simple font dialog.
Version:
0.1 Dec-6-1996
Author:
Kelvin R. Lawrence

font_dialog(Frame, String, boolean)

action(Event, Object)
getFontName()
Returns the name of the selected font.
getFontSize()
Returns the size of the selected font.
getFontStyle()
Returns the style of the selected font.
main(String[])
show()
Causes the font dialog window to be displayed.

font_dialog 
  public font_dialog(Frame parent,
                     String title,
                     boolean modal)
Parameters:
parent - Parent frame window.
title - Title string for this dialog.
modal - Modality switch.

show 
  public void show()
Causes the font dialog window to be displayed.
Overrides:
show in class Window
action 
  public boolean action(Event evt,
                        Object what)
Overrides:
action in class Component
getFontName 
  public String getFontName()
Returns the name of the selected font.
getFontSize 
  public int getFontSize()
Returns the size of the selected font.
getFontStyle 
  public int getFontStyle()
Returns the style of the selected font. It will be an integer matching one of PLAIN,BOLD,ITALIC or BOLD+ITALIC as defined in the Font class.
main 
  public static void main(String args[])
